title: Osher Gunsberg shares adorable photo of son Wolfie snuggled in bed
text:
Osher Gunsberg welcomed his first child, son Wolfgang 'Wolfie' Günsberg, in August - and he is smitten.

On Tuesday, the 45-year-old took to Instagram to share a photo of his beloved boy and revealed that he hasn't been the best sleeper.

Alongside the photo, Osher captioned: 'Here's a nice photo of our son Wolfgang.⁠ This is him sleeping. ⁠

'He approaches sleeping with randomness!' On Tuesday, Osher Gunsberg shared an adorable photo of baby son Wolfie (pictured) snuggled in bed

'Which is something he approaches with a randomness of scheduling which is nothing short of baffling to the point of being impressive.'

Osher has shut down the idea of having more children, just two months after his wife Audrey Griffen gave birth to their son.

Speaking to Now To Love, the TV presenter hinted her may be getting a vasectomy, saying: 'I will be in the butcher in December and the shop is getting closed.'

Alongside the photo, Osher captioned: 'Here's a nice photo of our son Wolfgang.⁠ This is him sleeping. ⁠Which is something he approaches with a randomness of scheduling which is nothing short of baffling to the point of being impressive'

No more! Osher has shut down the idea of having more children, just two months after his wife Audrey Griffen (pictured) gave birth to their son

'It's not a competition to see who can have more babies,' he added.

Osher, who has previously opened up his mental health struggles, also revealed he went back onto his medication several weeks before his son was born.

He explained: 'When I got sick about five years ago, I had episodes of psychosis that manifested into paranoid delusions. I could see that a lot of those things were happening again but I didn't want to admit it.'

No more! Osher claimed that the 'shop is getting closed' and 'it shouldn't be a competition to see who can have more babies.' Pictured: Osher and wife Audrey

Proud dad: In August, Osher welcomed his first child, son Wolfgang 'Wolfie' Günsberg, with his wife Audrey. Pictured: Osher and wife Audrey with son Wolfie

In August, Osher announced he had welcomed his son via Instagram, sharing a photo of himself and his wife with their newborn.

'He and @Audreygriffen did so well on Friday when he was born perfectly formed with ten fingers and toes, healthy and happy at 3.97kg,' he wrote.

Osher is also a stepfather to Georgia, 15, from Audrey's previous relationship.

authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
